      • isHostAvailable

        public static boolean isHostAvailable(java.lang.String host,
                                      int port,
                                      int timeout)
        Check if host is reachable.
        Parameters:
        host - The host to check for availability. Can either be a machine name, such as "google.com", or a textual representation of its IP address, such as "8.8.8.8".
        port - The port number.
        timeout - The timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        True if the host is reachable. False otherwise.
